Canal St [R][W] Station - no transfer to [J][Z][N][Q][6] from the uptown platform during stair repairs
C‌anal St [R][W] Station - no transfer to [J][Z][N][Q][6] from the uptown platform during stair repairs

Alternatives during closure:
For [N][Q][6], take any uptown train to 14 St-Union Sq. For [J][Z], take any downtown train from 14 St to this station.
For Spring St, Bleecker St, and Astor Pl [6] stations, take any uptown train to Prince St or 8 St-NYU [R][W] stations.
Overnight, when the [R][W] do not serve this station, take the [N] instead.
Special Note: If you start your trip at City Hall, Cortlandt St, Rector St, Whitehall St-South Ferry, Borough Hall, Jay St-MetroTech, and DeKalb Av, you can still receive a free transfer (out-of-system, across fare control area) during construction. Here's how:
1. When you arrive at the Canal St uptown platform, exit turnstiles, and go across fare control area.
2. Re-enter at no additional charge by using the same phone, bank card, OMNY Card, or MetroCard used at the start of your trip from the stations listed above.

What's happening?
We're making stairway improvements
